meanings.definition: More peacock-like in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The garden statue looked even peacockier in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the peacockier of the two at the party.
meanings.sent3: The peacockier the outfit, the more attention it attracted.
meanings.sent4: The peacockier colors of the sunset painted the sky beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The peacockier feathers shimmered in the morning dew.

meanings.sent1: The new peacockier design caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: This painting is peacockier than the one you did last week.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so peacockier than expected, it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as peacockier as a peacock's call.
meanings.sent5: The garden became peacockier with each new flower blooming.
